entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 except temperature steady near minus 12 along the Strait.
